name: Wuthering Heights (2009 television serial)
summary: Based on the classic novel by Emily Brontë, Wuthering Heights is a story of love, obsession, hate and revenge. The protagonists, Cathy and Heathcliff, form a love that is dark and destructive and affects the lives of everyone around them.
info:
• 中文名: 呼啸山庄
